connector.description:
Search data on OpenSearch

The `query` parameter must be formatted in JSON.

If you specify the `certificate` property, you must base64 encode it before you pass it as a parameter.

camel.kamelet.opensearch-search-source.p.name: camel.kamelet.opensearch-search-source.period
camel.kamelet.opensearch-search-source.p.description: The time interval between two searches

camel.kamelet.opensearch-search-source.q.name: camel.kamelet.opensearch-search-source.query
camel.kamelet.opensearch-search-source.q.description: The query we want to use to search on OpenSearch.

camel.kamelet.opensearch-search-source.e.name: camel.kamelet.opensearch-search-source.enableSSL
camel.kamelet.opensearch-search-source.e.description: Do we want to connect using SSL?

camel.kamelet.opensearch-search-source.h.name: camel.kamelet.opensearch-search-source.hostAddresses
camel.kamelet.opensearch-search-source.h.description: Comma separated list with ip:port formatted remote transport addresses to use.

camel.kamelet.opensearch-search-source.i.name: camel.kamelet.opensearch-search-source.indexName
camel.kamelet.opensearch-search-source.i.description: The name of the index to act against.

camel.kamelet.opensearch-search-source.c.name: camel.kamelet.opensearch-search-source.certificate
camel.kamelet.opensearch-search-source.c.description: The Certificate for accessing the Opensearch cluster. You must encode this value in base64.
